pr_title: [KEYCLOAK-11345] - Test basic features of Keycloak.X with current testsuite

timeline.message:
[KEYCLOAK-11345] - Test basic features of Keycloak.X with current testsuite

Co-authored-by: mhajas <mhajas@redhat.com>

timeline.bodyText: We should create a bug report for this and handle in a separate PR
timeline.author: stianst

replies.bodyText:
I can send a separate PR, I thought that this change was too simple to deserve one.
Basically, we get some errors when calling getUri on the httpRequest when running Quarkus. I did not investigate further the reasons but I suspect some mismatch in resteasy versions.
replies.author: pedroigor
